languages.text: {n}Роскошество и монументальность залы не уступают важности творящегося в ней священнодействия. Служители Омниссии движутся в такт ропоту механизмов, словно кружась в замысловатом танце вокруг громады Космического волка, застывшего подобно статуе. Аромат священных благовоний заполняет воздух, даруя ощущение сопричастности к великому ритуалу.{/n}

{n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Роскошество и монументальность залы не уступают важности творящегося в ней священнодействия. Аромат священных благовоний заполняет воздух, даруя ощущение сопричастности к великому ритуалу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}华丽而庄严的房间中举行着肃穆的圣礼。在机器低沉的嗡嗡声中，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们按照节律，环绕在体格壮硕的太空野狼周围，仿佛在表演一场复杂的舞蹈，而乌尔法却纹丝不动。空气中弥漫着圣香的味道，让你感觉你正在见证一场重大的仪式。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}华丽而庄严的房间中举行着肃穆的圣礼。在机器低沉的嗡嗡声中，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们按照节律，环绕在体格壮硕的太空野狼周围，仿佛在表演一场复杂的舞蹈，而乌尔法却纹丝不动。空气中弥漫着圣香的味道，让你感觉你正在见证一场重大的仪式。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}その豪華で広々しい部屋は、そこで繰り広げられる厳粛な聖餐に相応しい。万機神に仕える者たちは、まるで複雑なダンスを披露するかのように、仕掛けに合わせて動き、微動だにしない巨大なスペースウルフの周りを回っている。神聖なお香の匂いが部屋を満たしており、その儀式が偉大であることを感じさせている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その豪華で広々しい部屋は、そこで繰り広げられる厳粛な聖餐に相応しい。万機神に仕える者たちは、まるで複雑なダンスを披露するかのように、仕掛けに合わせて動き、微動だにしない巨大なスペースウルフの周りを回っている。神聖なお香の匂いが部屋を満たしており、その儀式が偉大であることを感じさせている。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}El esplendor y la magnitud de la cámara son dignas del sacramento que se desarrolla en su interior. Como si celebraran un complejo baile, los sirvientes del Omnissiah se mueven al compás de los mecanismos murmurantes, rodeando al enorme Lobo Espacial, que permanece inmóvil. El olor penetrante del incienso sagrado impregna el aire, concienciando a los presentes de la grandeza del ritual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El esplendor y la magnitud de la cámara son dignas del sacramento que se desarrolla en su interior. Como si celebraran un complejo baile, los sirvientes del Omnissiah se mueven al compás de los mecanismos murmurantes, rodeando al enorme Lobo Espacial, que permanece inmóvil. El olor penetrante del incienso sagrado impregna el aire, concienciando a los presentes de la grandeza del ritual.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}La splendeur de cette salle monumentale sied à la solennité du sacrement qui s'y déroule. Comme s'ils effectuaient une danse complexe, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie se déplacent en rythme avec les mécanismes murmurants, tournant autour de l'imposant Space Wolf qui se tient parfaitement immobile. L'odeur de l'encens sacré qui emplit l'air donne l'impression que l'on assiste à un rituel sacré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La splendeur de cette salle monumentale sied à la solennité du sacrement qui s'y déroule. Comme s'ils effectuaient une danse complexe, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie se déplacent en rythme avec les mécanismes murmurants, tournant autour de l'imposant Space Wolf qui se tient parfaitement immobile. L'odeur de l'encens sacré qui emplit l'air donne l'impression que l'on assiste à un rituel sacré.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Der monumentale Glanz der Kammer passt zur Feierlichkeit des Sakraments, das darin vollzogen wird. Als würden sie einen ausgeklügelten Tanz aufführen, bewegen sich die Diener des Omnissiah im Takt mit den murmelnden Mechanismen, umkreisen den reglosen gigantischen Space Wolf. Der Geruch von heiligem Weihrauch füllt die Luft und verleiht einem das Gefühl, Zeuge eines großen Rituals zu werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odanın şatafatı ve görkemi, içerideki ayinin ciddiyetine layık. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları; mırıldanan makine sesleriyle aynı anda hareket ediyor, olduğu yerde duran devasa Uzay Kurdu'nun etrafında dört dönüyor, âdeta incelikli bir dans sergiliyorlar. Odayı dolduran kutsal tütsü kokusu, büyük bir ayine şahit olduğunuz hissini veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The splendour and monumentality of the chamber befit the solemnity of the sacrament unfolding within. As if performing an intricate dance, the servants of the Omnissiah move in time with the murmuring mechanisms, circling the massive Space Wolf while he stands utterly still. The scent of sacred incense fills the air, giving the sense that one is witnessing a great ritual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Odanın şatafatı ve görkemi, içerideki ayinin ciddiyetine layık. Hermesih hizmetkârları, mırıldanan makine sesleriyle incelikli bir dansı sergilercesine zamanda hareket ediyor, olduğu yerde duran devasa Uzay Kurdu'nun etrafında dört dönüyorlar. Kutsal tütsü kokusu odayı doldurup büyük bir ayine şahit olduğunuz hissini veriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
